function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Congregating highly susceptible individuals with those likely to have tb disease"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Expense of negative-pressure mechanical ventilation"},{"category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate dependency of natural ventilation"},{"category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited use of upper-room uv light in healthcare facilities"},{"category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exhaust vents positioned in the lower part of the room may lead to air contamination and increased risk of disease transmission."},{"category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Wire mesh floors in animal cages may not effectively prevent faecal-oral transmission of tb."},{"category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of uv lights and their maintenance may expose healthcare staff and patients to adverse uv effects."},{"category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential for transmission of contagious diseases among guinea pigs due to ventilation and ionization of air"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exposure to ozone from ionizers"},{"category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of improper handling and disposal of infected animals"},{"category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Continuous operation of uv lights and fans may lead to maintenance issues and malfunction"},{"category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffective sterilization and exhaust of air may lead to contamination and disease spread"},{"category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure of guinea pigs to ward air may lead to the transmission of contagious diseases"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control intervention in the control group"},{"category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Imbalanced airflow between animal enclosures"},{"category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of statistical analysis to compare tb infections between groups"},{"category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Hospital-acquired infections from smear-positive hiv patients with pulmonary tb"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air mixing in patient wards"},{"category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate animal ethical approval and supervision"},{"category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diminished uv intensity at height 1.8 m"},{"category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High negative ion concentration in the ionizer enclosure"},{"category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dust-related tb outbreak due to ionizer cleaning"},{"category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of tb in the exposure chambers"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Proximity of tb-infected animals in exposure chambers"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contamination of the environment with tb particulates"},{"category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Possibility of airborne transmission of tb disease"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nonsignificant trend for uv lights to be more and uv lights"},{"category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential airborne transmission of tb in a clinical setting."},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate positioning or installation of uv fixtures leading to occupant over-exposure"},{"category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of safety measures leading to adverse uv effects on patients and staff"},{"category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to mitigate tb infection due to lack of uv light intervention in congregate settings"},{"category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate uv intensity due to lack of maintenance and degradation of uv bulbs."},{"category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Unclear guidelines for upper-room uv installation and maintenance, leading to ineffective use."},{"category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on expensive uv fixtures and bulbs, limiting accessibility in resource-limited environments."},{"category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of effective air mixing in patient rooms"},{"category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of upper-room uv in protecting health care workers from airborne infection"},{"category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adverse effect of increasing relative humidity on uv germicidal efficacy"},{"category":"Mental health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Higher ion densities achieved in poultry studies may not be applicable to healthcare environments, reducing the effectiveness of ionizers in preventing tb transmission."},{"category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accumulation of potentially infectious particles onto adjacent surfaces or grounded parts of the ionizer, leading to localized outbreak of tb-infected animals and potential risk of transmission to humans."},{"category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Static charge interference with medical equipment due to ionizers, potentially leading to malfunctions or hazards in medical equipment."},{"category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate cleaning and handling of the ionizers leading to potential risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Tb infection spreading in overcrowded settings"},{"category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of studies in clinical settings for
